name: A Lenda do Herói
summary: A Lenda do Herói (The Legend of Hero) is a platform game with musical elements created by the Castro Brothers and developed by Dumativa Studio, released for Microsoft Windows on 24 March 2016. The player controls a knight who must pass monsters and obstacles to complete a phase and at the end rescue a princess. The song, sung by Matheus Castro and Marcos Castro, follows the player's actions in real time, adapting to the situation on the screen.
